treatment-md.title: Hermeuptychia hermybius Cong & Grishin, 2014, sp. n.
treatment-md.article-title: A new Hermeuptychia (Lepidoptera, Nymphalidae, Satyrinae) is sympatric and synchronic with H. sosybius in southeast US coastal plains, while another new Hermeuptychia species - not hermes - inhabits south Texas and northeast Mexico
